<noinclude>

This is the '''Csp formfield/number''' template. It should be called in the following format:

<pre>
{{Csp formfield/number 
|name= (text) 
|required= (optional: "required")
|value= (number) e.g. "7"
|min= (optional: number) minimum value e.g. "0"
|max= (optional: number) maximum value e.g. "10"
|step= (optional: number) step bewteen value options e.g. "0.01" 
}}
</pre>

== Example ==
{{Csp formfield/number
|name=Age
|value=31
}}
{{Csp formfield/number
|name=Age
|value=7
|min=18
|step=0.5
}}

Related templates:
{{#ask:[[~*Csp formfield/*]] 
|mainlabel=Page
|format=table 
|sort=Title
}}

</noinclude><includeonly><input type="number" 
name="{{{name|}}}"
class="form-control" 
required="{{{required|}}}"
value="{{{value|}}}"
min="{{{min|}}}"
max="{{{max|}}}"
step="{{{step|}}}"
/></includeonly>
